name: Maritz Dungeon
description: Our second game. I made the code and a friend made the art. You play as https://www.twitch.tv/maritzhd in a mysterious Dungeon. You can balance your stats(Health,Speed,Strength) by selecting which to increase by 2 with the mouse wheel and pressing the right mosue button to increase this one and decrease the other two by 1. You walk with WASD and shoot with the left mouse button in the direction of your cursor. There are magic cards you can buy from a mage for your life you can activate them by simply clicking on them.
